property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your {Chaos} attack gets +1 damage. R Commit, Discard 1 momentum: After an attack you played deals damage, add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play this card as a block, draw 1 card and then discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If your opponent has no ready foundations, they lose 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, add +1 difficulty to All of your cards unless you discard 1 momentum before making the control check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets -1 speed and +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X momentum: This attack gets +X speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack deals damage, destroy any 1 asset.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: After your opponent plays an attack, its damage is reduced to 0. X equals the difficulty of the attack played by your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, All of your attacks get +2 damage. F: Take 1 card from your discard pile and add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: When you play this card into your card pool, place X Iron counters on it. E Commit: Your attack gets +2 damage. Only playable while the printed difficulty of the attack is equal to or less than the number of Iron counters on this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Place the top 3 cards of your deck face down under this card. F Commit: Take 1 card from under this card and add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, Discard 1 momentum: After you take damage from an unblocked attack, commit any 2 foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play a foundation or asset into your card pool, take 1 card from your card pool and add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play an asset into your card pool, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After 1 of your attacks is successfully blocked, take 1 card from your hand and add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After 1 of your attacks is blocked, you and your opponent both lose 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your opponent loses 1 vitality. Only playable while you have more cards in your hand than your opponent has in their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you take damage, reduce that damage by 2 (minimum 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, Commit 1 other foundation: Choose 1 of the following. Commit any card.Ready any committed card.Any player discards 1 card.Any player draws 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After you play a Form card or ability, draw 1 card. E Commit: Your opponent's attack is fully blocked.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Choose a number then make a control check. If the check matches the chosen number, this attack gets +2 speed and +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +1 damage for each card in any card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard this card from your card pool: Discard the top 5 cards of any player's deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After this attack is blocked, your opponent loses 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent loses 1 vitality. Only playable while your opponent has less vitality than you.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack is unblockable. Only playable while you have twice the number of cards in your hand as your opponent has in their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 2 foundations, discard 2 momentum: Choose any word printed on a card your opponent has in play. This attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of letters in the chosen word.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Draw a card. While this card is in your card pool, it gets the ability 'R: After you play another action card with a F ability, ready any 1 card.'

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After an attack deals damage to your opponent, they draw 2 cards and lose 3 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit 2 foundations: Ready any card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, Discard X momentum: Ready X foundations. X must be equal to or less than the number of ready foundations your opponent controls.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Choose a card type. Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. If you reveal 2 or more cards of the chosen card type, your opponent reveals their hand and discards All cards of the chosen card type.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Make any attack unblockable. Only playable if you have already played 2 or more E abilities during this attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +1 speed. Tycho F Commit 1 foundation: Choose 1 {Order} card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you are dealt damage by an opponent's attack, you gain 2 vitality. Only playable while you have more vitality than your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Reveal the top card of any deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, Discard 1 momentum: Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose and discard 1 card in your opponent's hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent plays a non-attack card, discard 1 card from any card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you make a control check when attempting to block an attack, that control check gets +2. Only playable while you have more cards in your hand than your opponent has in their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard or destroy X momentum, foundations, or assets that you control in any combination: This attack gets +X speed or +X damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Choose 1 foundation. Make a control check where the difficulty is equal to the difficulty of the chosen foundation plus 2. If successful, destroy the chosen foundation. If you destroy the chosen foundation you may discard 2 momentum to ready this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While ready, All cards get +1 difficulty. F: Commit this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Place 2 Time tokens on this card. R Commit, Discard 1 Time token from this card: After you take damage from an attack, your opponent's Combat Phase ends and your opponent gains control of this card.
